content.question:
​

<math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
<math alttext="y"><semantics><mi>y</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
<math alttext="0"><semantics><mn>0</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
<math alttext="e to the power of 1 plus 4"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>e</mi><mn>1</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
<math alttext="1"><semantics><mn>1</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
<math alttext="e cubed plus 4"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>e</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
<math alttext="2"><semantics><mn>2</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
<math alttext="e to the power of 5 plus 4"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>e</mi><mn>5</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
<math alttext="3"><semantics><mn>3</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
<math alttext="e to the power of 7 plus 4"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>e</mi><mn>7</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
<math alttext="4"><semantics><mn>4</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
<math alttext="e to the power of 9 plus 4"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>e</mi><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>
​
​The table gives coordinates of five points <math alttext="open parentheses x comma y close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Based on these values, which of the following gives <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> as a function of <math alttext="y"><semantics><mi>y</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="x equals negative 2 plus ln open parentheses y minus 4 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="x equals negative 1 plus ln open parentheses square root of y minus 4 end root close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><msqrt><mi>y</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></msqrt></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="x equals negative 1 half plus ln open parentheses y minus 4 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="x equals negative 1 half plus ln open parentheses square root of y minus 4 end root close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><msqrt><mi>y</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></msqrt></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="x equals negative 1 half plus ln open parentheses square root of y minus 4 end root close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><msqrt><mi>y</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></msqrt></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

topic.text: 2.13: Exponential and Logarithmic Equations and Inequalities

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
